summary: A simple conversion of Backsteppo\'s Dragon Priest\'s Armor to the UNP body by Dimon99.
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple mesh replacer to the UNP body for Backsteppo\'s excellent Dragon Priest\'s Armor found here:

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6537

The original file is REQUIRED for this replacer to work, therefore download the above file first, then install this mod to the proper directory, overwriting where necessary.

==========
To Install:
==========

1) Unzip the file.
2) Examine the file structure to make sure it looks correct.
3) Place the \'Data\' folder into your Skyrim main directory and click \'yes\' to any overwrite prompt.
4) Play!

It should be noted that there will be instances of clipping in certain more extreme positions, but for the most part clipping shouldn\'t be an issue for normal play, only in certain poses for screenshots and the like.
Any questions should be left in the comments thread and I\'ll answer when I am able.

Enjoy.

- Canoness

===========
Credits
===========

Thanks to Dimon99 for the wonderful UNP body.
Thanks to Backsteppo for his excellent Dragon Priest\'s armor.
Thanks to Bethesda for the awesome game that is Skyrim.
And lastly, thanks to Nifscope for not being overally complicated so that a dunce like me can use it.
author: Canoness
